body:
Hell, I am exploring Radiance materials on Honeybee. I would like to simulate half transparent materials like cloth and poly carbonate. Dose anyone know how to do it? I read the article about mixfunc ([here](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/referencing-a-perforated-radiance-mixfunc-material-with-perforate)) and tried same process but I couldn't add texfunc material on honeybee library. Material I made is below; void texfunc gran_tex
4 gran_dx gran_dy gran_dz C:\Radiance\lib\plink.cal
0
0
gran_tex glass granular_glass_6
0
0
3 0.982 1.0 0.987 and the result  I get is ; 1. Solution exception:Invalid integer literal
